about:
Hello! I'm **Anoop**, a final year CS Undergrad and a software developer with an effective mindset of learning and implementing modern technologies.

I am working as SDE intern at **Mentor Graphics** a.k.a Siemens EDA. I also indulge myself in competitive programming thus sharpening my problem solving skills to apply in real life situations for quick and optimised solutions. 
 I have worked on projects based on the web using latest technologies heading towards the market. I have also dabbled in Web technologies like **React** and built some projects using it, including this website.
